name.title: Name for App: v2 REPL for Support

short_description.title: Description for App: v2 REPL
short_description.value: An interactive API console for Zendesk Apps framework developers

long_description.title: Long Description for App: v2 REPL
long_description.value:
Try out Framework v2 APIs in an interactive console

* Useful for debugging * Experiment before you implement * Test all app locations

By enabling this app, You agree to the [Built by Zendesk Terms of Use](https://www.zendesk.com/company/built-by-zendesk-agmt/).

installation_instructions.title: Installation Instructions for App: v2 REPL
installation_instructions.value: Simply click Install and start using the app.
